comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: Let the Benghazi issue rest- it's been invested and settle- it was the Congress that cut the funding for increased security in that area! This goes for the emails as well- investigated and dealt with.

replies.author: Allison
replies.text: A republican congress. Do people realize this fact???

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: OMG: Did you see the latest emails? This was Hillary's fault. She is lying to everyone! Also out: When Comey said a prosecutor would not prosecute, even though he made it clear she was guilty, it's because corruption went clear to the top! Even Obama! Wake up America! Please do your own research! Hillary is for open borders & TPP! She has been lying to us. She is for wealthy only! She will destroy America! This is election is the most important election in history! We have been setup for One World Order!

replies.author: Rebekah
replies.text: GOP still beating the dead email horse! Why because they got nothing but mud slinging!
